UPLOADERS NOTE:
=========================================


WHAT IS THIS PROGRAM?

Did you ever want to take single screenshots of a video, or a thumbnail sheet - just like you see many people provide when they give videos? Well this is probably the best program - fully customisable. If you love taking screenshots/thumbnail sheets of videos - there is no program better than this, trust me - I've looked! 


WHY DOES THE KEYGEN NOT WORK?

The DVT keygen does not work! DVT screwed up the keygen back when they made it for version 3.0.0.1. I don't know why they labelled the keygen as "3.x" just wrongly assuming that it will unlock all future versions when it doesn't even unlock the current version! Looks like a bit of laziness on their part by bundling the keygen from 3.0.0.1 into this 3.0.0.2 version.
